item.title: "AVISP [internet services] has put a smile on our faces."
item.description:
"AVISP [internet services] has put a smile on our faces."

AVISP [internet services] has put a smile on our faces. It is so much faster than dial up, and we have received outstanding personal attention and service. Thank you AVISP!" Sincerely, Ron and Kris Dick Ron , Healdsburg, CA | May 02, 2009 Working hard on upgrades and cabling.
